attributes.action: Save Bishops Court Residential Home, Ollerton, Notts, from Closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bishops Court a purpose built residential home, housing 45 assesed elderly people requiring 24hr care, is proposed to close along with 7 others in Notts. There is no where for these residents to go, and the staff will face compulsary redundancies. Geographicaly this home draws on a third of the county of Nottinghamshire and provides an extensive day centre and rest bite facilities. Please help us keep it open? We have 7000 signatures to present to Gordon Brown already. Thank you for you support.
